solution_line_template: Kristine traveled on the bus {train_distance} km / {bus_distance_divisor} = <<{train_distance}/{bus_distance_divisor}={bus_distance}>>{bus_distance} km.
With the cab, she had to drive {bus_distance} km / {cab_distance_divisor} = <<{bus_distance}/{cab_distance_divisor}={cab_distance}>>{cab_distance} km.
In total she had to cover {bus_distance} km + {cab_distance} km + {train_distance} km = <<{bus_distance}+{cab_distance}+{train_distance}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} km.
